plot: A bloodied young biker awakens in a deserted road. His solitude is interrupted by the arrival of a stranger who will change his life.
title: Km. 45
plot_es: A bloodied young biker awakens in a deserted road. His solitude is interrupted by the arrival of a stranger who will change his life.
plot_en: A bloodied young biker awakens in a deserted road. His solitude is interrupted by the arrival of a stranger who will change his life.
